content: learn how to crochet a basic hairband with this quick and easy pattern this size-adjustable crochet hairband uses less than 20 grams of yarn and makes for a great first project or last-minute gift materials * 15 grams of medium weight yarn 24/7 cotton in bay leaf * 4mm clover amour crochet hook * scissors dimensions includes instructions to adjust sizing * hairband 4 5 centimeters wide x 31 centimeters long 1 8 x 12 2 inches * each strap 26 centimeters long 10 2 inches * overall 4 5 centimeters wide x 83 centimeters long 1 8 x 32 7 inches
